description: Tom McGlinchey scores twice in the first half to lead Tamworth to a comfortable home win over struggling Boston United.
title: Tamworth 3-0 Boston United
maintext:
Tom McGlinchey struck twice in the first half as Tamworth ran out 3-0 winners over struggling Boston in National League.
Ben Milnes also got on the scoresheet in a convincing win by the hosts at the Lamb Ground, with McGlinchey the width of the crossbar away from claiming a hat-trick.
McGlinchey opened the scoring with a volley following a Tom Tonks throw-in after 17 minutes before doubling the lead nine minutes before the break.
Jas Singh kept out a Jimmy Knowles header to prevent Boston pulling one back and Milnes made the game safe after 66 minutes after McGlinchey had hit the woodwork.
